name: TacoFace
description: Have you ever dreamed of having rocket launchers for arms and laser blasters for eyes while delicious tacos rain down on you? Well, your dream is now a reality. Uh, virtual reality.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer. Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
